::Neody::

Neody jumps back from the flames, though he's burned quite a bit. He
watches the dragon fly off.

"What was that all about?" he asks his fellow Destrons, keeping an eye
on the direction in which the dragon has left.

> The missiles hit the dragon but it becomes enraged. But instead of
trying to 
> roast Falcon and Snare it flies off in a different direction.
